name: Witch House Breakout
description:
Witch House Breakout

(48 hour production time)

................   About the Game   ................

Do you have what it takes to escape the witch's lair? Or will you be lost wandering these haunted halls forever?

In this brief action platformer you must collect keys and power-ups to escape the haunted house, but beware the witch is eager to make sure that you don't make it out alive. You must find a way to defeat the witch in order to escape.

................   From the Devs   ................

We spent 48 hours on this game as a test to see how much we could accomplish given a short amount of time. We had a lot of fun making it and aspire to make many more in the future. To anyone who stopped by to check out our game, it means the world to us. We hope you will stick around to see what adventures we have for you next!

(P.S. We plan on making an improved version of this game before moving on to the next project, so stay tuned!)

Art/Animation: twitter.com/qtrmastrkillian

Programmer:  twitter.com/_j_bala_

(Currently Windows Only. Mac version coming soon)
